---
name: Device support request
about: Request support for a new Thermalright device
title: '[DEVICE] '
labels: enhancement, hardware
assignees: ''
---

**Device model**

Full product name (e.g. Thermalright AX120 Digital).

**USB ID**

Run `lsusb` and paste the line for your Thermalright device:

```
Bus 001 Device 005: ID 0416:XXXX ...
```

**Detection output**

Run `trcc detect` and paste the output:

```
Paste output here
```

**Device capabilities**

- [ ] LCD screen (displays images/themes)
- [ ] LED RGB lighting
- [ ] Both

**Additional context**

- Does this device work in Windows TRCC? Which tab? (FormUSBLCD / FormHID / FormLED)
- Photo of the device (optional, but helpful)
